name: Whale
author: Stefvel
notes: Only have 2 soldier unlike most players using 3 so I subbed in a second chain. Hard match ups for me was flying fish when they get a good board swarm and pop everything and the random tilt that you see. Lost a KOG promo to Odion life cost 0 with scolding set turn 1, probably got a little greedy going for whale on my second turn.
